org.jamwiki

Interface SearchEngine

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LuceneSearchEngine, RankingAlgorithmSearchEngine

    public interface SearchEngine
    This interface provides all methods needed for interacting with a search engine.
    See Also:
    WikiBase.getSearchEngine()

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String SEARCH_ENGINE_LUCENE
      Lucene search engine class
      static String SEARCH_ENGINE_RANKINGALGORITHM
      RankingAlgorithm search engine class

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addToIndex(Topic topic)
      Add a topic to the search index.
      void commit(String virtualWiki)
      Force a flush of any pending commits to the search index.
      void deleteFromIndex(Topic topic)
      Remove a topic from the search index.
      List<SearchResultEntry> findResults(String virtualWiki, String text, List<Integer> namespaces)
      Find all documents that contain a specific search term, ordered by relevance.
      void refreshIndex()
      Refresh the current search index by re-visiting all topic pages.
      void setAutoCommit(boolean autoCommit)
      Set a flag indicating whether or not every update of the search index should be immediately committed to the index.
      void setDisabled(boolean disabled)
      Temporarily disable the search engine from all write operations such as adding and updating topics in its index, but not from read operations such as performing searches.
      void shutdown()
      Trigger a shutdown of a search engine instance, allowing resources to be freed and any pending changes committed.
      void updateInIndex(Topic topic)
      Update a topic in the search index.

    • Field Detail

      • SEARCH_ENGINE_LUCENE

        static final String SEARCH_ENGINE_LUCENE
        Lucene search engine class
        See Also:

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • addToIndex

        void addToIndex(Topic topic)
        Add a topic to the search index.
        Parameters:
        topic - The Topic object that is to be added to the index.

      • commit

        void commit(String virtualWiki)
        Force a flush of any pending commits to the search index.
        Parameters:
        virtualWiki - The virtual wiki for which pending updates are being committed.

      • deleteFromIndex

        void deleteFromIndex(Topic topic)
        Remove a topic from the search index.
        Parameters:
        topic - The topic object that is to be removed from the index.

      • findResults

        List<SearchResultEntry> findResults(String virtualWiki,
                                    String text,
                                    List<Integer> namespaces)
        Find all documents that contain a specific search term, ordered by relevance.
        Parameters:
        virtualWiki - The virtual wiki for the topic.
        text - The search term being searched for.
        namespaces - A list of all namespaces that should be searched when retrieving results. If this list is null or empty then all namespaces will be searched.
        Returns:
        A list of SearchResultEntry objects for all documents that contain the search term.

      • refreshIndex

        void refreshIndex()
           throws Exception
        Refresh the current search index by re-visiting all topic pages.
        Throws:
        Exception - Thrown if any error occurs while re-indexing the Wiki.

      • setAutoCommit

        void setAutoCommit(boolean autoCommit)
        Set a flag indicating whether or not every update of the search index should be immediately committed to the index. This is useful mainly during batch updates when for performance reasons it is advantageous to commit only after the update is done.
        Parameters:
        autoCommit - A boolean indicating whether or not every update of the search index should be immediately committed to the index.

      • setDisabled

        void setDisabled(boolean disabled)
        Temporarily disable the search engine from all write operations such as adding and updating topics in its index, but not from read operations such as performing searches. This is useful in cases such as bulk loading of topic versions where the search engine only needs to be updated after the last topic version is inserted since all intermediate updates would have been overridden.
        Parameters:
        disabled - true to disable updates to the search engine index.

      • shutdown

        void shutdown()
       throws IOException
        Trigger a shutdown of a search engine instance, allowing resources to be freed and any pending changes committed.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown if a failure occurs during shutdown.

      • updateInIndex

        void updateInIndex(Topic topic)
        Update a topic in the search index.
        Parameters:
        topic - The Topic object that is to be updated in the index.
